name: Tortured Souls - Solo
description:
Continuing development from Tortured Souls :
https://precipire.itch.io/tortured-souls

Can you escape the dungeon? You, a wizard capable of harnessing the elements, find yourself in a weird dungeon full of elemental beings. Use spells, build your deck, defeat your foes and escape the dungeon, but whatever you do, don't become another tortured soul!

MAC OS now supported !

Keyboard&Mouse and GamePad now supported !

Control hints:

Keyboard&Mouse: Press H

GamePad: Press Right Thumb Stick Down

Please fill out the form or comment any bugs or issues with the game.

https://forms.gle/i4uhrKjs4YaN1xRS7

Made with Unity.
